name: Ball Frenzy Bounce
description:
Ball Frenzy Bounce has brought the spice of life back to ball breakers! Break down the bricks before they become too low and end your game. Also be sure to always keep your eyes on the ball!

Useful Tips:
-You are able to pause the game at the top left corner while going for high scores or when you just need a break.
-Hold and swipe left and right just below the paddle to control it.
-When releasing your finger from the paddle you are able to trade coins for power ups.


Various game power ups!
- Increase paddle size
- Triple shooter
- Larger balls
- Force field
- Earning bonus

Thank you for supporting us!

What to expect next?
- Game Center Leaderboard coming soon!
- More power ups


Contact us at toolitmedia@gmail.com
